text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.title: Cherished Trades Config
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.s: Toggles the entire HUD display on or off.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.p: Sets the distance between the stats and the edge of the screen. || default: 3
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.l: Sets the vertical distance between each line of text. || default: 3
Color used for labels (text before the value). || default: FF9D05
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.v: Color used for values (numbers or text after the label). || default: FFFFFF
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.s: Enable or disable the world age display.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.d: Minecraft internally starts counting days at 0. This value is added to the total to show 'Day 1' on your first day. || default: 1
Custom text to display before the day number.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.s: Enable or disable the in-game time display.
Enable or disable the XYZ position display.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.c: Custom text to display before the XYZ coordinates.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.s: Enable or disable the direction the player is facing.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.d: Choose how the facing direction is displayed.
Text shown before the direction value. Default is an arrow.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.s: Enable or disable the counter for totems used in this world.
text.autoconfig.cherishedtrades.option.t: Custom text to display before the totem count.
